languages.text: Луна Фолстоуна, обращенная в храмовую комету, несла слово святого Когнация по всему Простору. Защищая миры от нападок врагов Человечества, служители ее не просили ни денег, ни власти, а лишь реликвии, оставшиеся от их благословенного покровителя. Мудрые отдавали их сразу и с почтением, надменные же познавали, сколь тяжек Молот Фолстоуна.

Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.
languages.original_text: Луна Фолстоуна, обращенная в храмовую комету, несла слово святого Когнация по всему Простору. Защищая миры от нападок врагов Человечества, служители ее не просили ни денег, ни власти, а лишь реликвии, оставшиеся от их благословенного покровителя. Мудрые отдавали их сразу и с почтением, надменные же познавали, сколь тяжек Молот Фолстоуна.

Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

languages.text: 荒寂岩地的卫星被改造成了一座巨大的神龛，将圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的教诲传遍了整个科罗努斯扩区。荒寂岩地的仆人保护无数世界免受人类之敌的攻击，而这些人既不要求金钱也不要求权力，只要求回收神圣的庇护者留下的遗物。聪慧之人会满怀敬意，将这些遗物物归原主，而傲慢之人则会亲身感受到荒寂岩地的神圣战锤有多么沉重。
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: 荒寂岩地的卫星被改造成了一座巨大的神龛，将圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的教诲传遍了整个科罗努斯扩区。荒寂岩地的仆人保护无数世界免受人类之敌的攻击，而这些人既不要求金钱也不要求权力，只要求回收神圣的庇护者留下的遗物。聪慧之人会满怀敬意，将这些遗物物归原主，而傲慢之人则会亲身感受到荒寂岩地的神圣战锤有多么沉重。

languages.text: 彗星神殿に改築されたファウルストーンの月は、聖コグナティウスの言葉をエクスパンス中に広めた。惑星を人類の敵から守りながら、そのしもべ達が要求するのは金銭でも権力でもなく、彼らの祝福されし支援者が残した聖遺物だけであった。賢い者は崇敬を込めてそれを引き渡し、傲慢な者はファウルストーンの鉄槌の重さを思い知った。
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: 彗星神殿に改築されたファウルストーンの月は、聖コグナティウスの言葉をエクスパンス中に広めた。惑星を人類の敵から守りながら、そのしもべ達が要求するのは金銭でも権力でもなく、彼らの祝福されし支援者が残した聖遺物だけであった。賢い者は崇敬を込めてそれを引き渡し、傲慢な者はファウルストーンの鉄槌の重さを思い知った。

languages.text: Convertie en comète sanctuaire, la lune de Rochepeste répandit la parole de Saint Cognatius à travers les Étendues. Lorsqu'ils protégeaient des mondes contre des attaques d'ennemis de l'humanité, ses serviteurs ne demandaient ni argent ni pouvoir, mais seulement les reliques laissées par leur saint patron. Les sages les leur remettaient avec respect, tandis que les gens hautains découvraient avec quelle force pouvait s'abattre le Marteau de Rochepeste.
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: Convertie en comète sanctuaire, la lune de Rochepeste répandit la parole de Saint Cognatius à travers les Étendues. Lorsqu'ils protégeaient des mondes contre des attaques d'ennemis de l'humanité, ses serviteurs ne demandaient ni argent ni pouvoir, mais seulement les reliques laissées par leur saint patron. Les sages les leur remettaient avec respect, tandis que les gens hautains découvraient avec quelle force pouvait s'abattre le Marteau de Rochepeste.

languages.text: Convertida en un templo cometa, la luna de Rocainmunda llevó la palabra de san Cognatius por toda la Extensión. Mientras protegían a sus mundos de los ataques de los enemigos de la Humanidad, sus sirvientes no pidieron dinero ni poder en compensación, solo las reliquias de su bendito patrón. Los sabios se las entregaban con reverencia, mientras que los soberbios descubrieron el peso del Martillo de Rocainmunda.
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: Convertida en un templo cometa, la luna de Rocainmunda llevó la palabra de Cognatius por toda la Extensión. Mientras protegían a sus mundos de los ataques de los enemigos de la Humanidad, sus sirvientes no pidieron dinero ni poder en compensación, solo las reliquias de su bendito patrón. Los sabios se las entregaban con reverencia, mientras que los soberbios descubrieron el peso del Martillo de Rocainmunda.

languages.text: Der Mond von Foulstone, zu einem Kometenschrein umfunktioniert, verbreitete das Wort des Hl. Cognatius in der ganzen Ausdehnung. Seine Diener beschützten Welten vor Angriffen durch Feinde der Menschheit und verlangten dafür weder Geld noch Macht, sondern nur die Relikte, die ihr gesegneter Patron zurückgelassen hatte. Die Weisen übergaben sie mit Ehrfurcht, wohingegen die Überheblichen rasch lernten, wie schwer der Hammer von Foulstone war.
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: Der Mond von Foulstone, zu einem Kometenschrein umfunktioniert, verbreitete das Wort des Hl. Cognatius in der ganzen Ausdehnung. Seine Diener beschützten Welten vor Angriffen durch Feinde der Menschheit und verlangten dafür weder Geld noch Macht, sondern nur die Relikte, die ihr gesegneter Patron zurückgelassen hatte. Die Weisen übergaben sie mit Ehrfurcht, wohingegen die Überheblichen rasch lernten, wie schwer der Hammer von Foulstone war.

languages.text: Menfurtaş'ın kuyruklu yıldız mabedine dönüştürülen ayı, Aziz Cognatius'un kelamını Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yaydı. Dünyaları İnsanlığın düşmanlarının saldırılarından koruyan hizmetkârları ne para ne de güç istedi. Tek istedikleri, kutsanmış hamilerinin bıraktığı yadigârlardı. Aklıselim olanlar bu yadigârları hürmetle takdim ederken kibirli olanlarsa Menfurtaş Çekici'nin ne kadar ağır olduğunu öğrendi.
languages.original_text: Converted into a comet shrine, Foulstone's moon spread the word of Saint Cognatius throughout the Expanse. Protecting worlds from attacks by the enemies of Humanity, its servants asked for neither money nor power, but only the relics left by their blessed patron. The wise handed them over with reverence, while the haughty learned how heavy the Hammer of Foulstone was.

traits.locale_text: Menfurtaş'ın bir kuyruklu yıldız mabedine dönüştürülen ayı, Aziz Cognatius'un kelamını Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yaydı. Dünyaları İnsanlığın düşmanlarının saldırılarından koruyan hizmetkârları ne para ne de güç istedi. Tek istedikleri kutsanmış hamilerinin bıraktığı yadigârlardı. Aklıselim olanlar bu yadigârları hürmetle takdim etti, kibirli olanlar ise Menfurtaş'ın Çekiç'inin ne kadar ağır olduğunu öğrendi.
